com.telekom.m2m.cot.restsdk.realtime

Class CepApi

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.telekom.m2m.cot.restsdk.realtime.CepApi

  • public class CepApi
extends Object
    The class that defines the CepApi. CEP stands for Complex-Event-Processing. CepApi returns a URL to a collection of modules. Created by Ozan Arslan on 14.08.2017.

    • Field Summary

      Fields

      static String NOTIFICATION_PATH

    • Method Detail

      • getCepConnector

        public CepConnector getCepConnector()
        Returns the connector that establishes the real time communication with the notification service.
        Returns:
        CepConnector

      • getModules

        public ModuleCollection getModules()
        [Prepare to] load all Modules (json only, no statements) from the server.
        Returns:
        the ModuleCollection

      • createModule

        public Module createModule(Module module)
        Create (i.e. persist) a new Module on the server.
        Parameters:
        module - the new Module. Will receive an ID from the server.
        Returns:
        the same Module instance

      • getModule

        public Module getModule(String id)
        Get an existing Module by ID. This will cause two separate requests because it needs to get the json as well as the statements.
        Parameters:
        id - the ID of the Module
        Returns:
        the Module

      • updateModule

        public void updateModule(Module module)
        Update a Module. This will cause two separate requests because it needs to update the json as well as the statements. TODO: maybe we should only update the dirty parts?
        Parameters:
        module - the Module that shall be updated on the server. The parameter instance will be updated with the response from the server (esp. lastModified).

      • deleteModule

        public void deleteModule(String id)
        Delete a Module by its ID.
        Parameters:
        id - the ID of the Module that should be deleted.
